form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to codify the prohibition against the reservation of gravesites at Arlington National Cemetery, and for other purposes.

section.header: Codification of prohibition against reservation of gravesites at Arlington National Cemetery

subsection.text: Chapter 24 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 2410 the following new section:

section.header: Arlington National Cemetery: other administrative matters

subsection.text: Not more than one gravesite may be provided at Arlington National Cemetery to a veteran or member of the Armed Forces who is eligible for interment at such cemetery and the family members of such veteran or member who are also eligible for interment at such cemetery.
A gravesite at Arlington National Cemetery may not be reserved for an individual before the death of such individual.
The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 24 of such title is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 2410 the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: 2410A. Arlington National Cemetery: other administrative matters.

paragraph.text: Except as provided in paragraph (2), section 2410A of such title, as added by subsection (a), shall apply with respect to all interments at Arlington National Cemetery after the date of the enactment of this Act.

Subsection (b) of such section, as so added, shall not apply with respect to the interment of an individual for whom a written request for a reserved gravesite was submitted to the Secretary of the Army before January 1, 1962.
Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of the Army shall submit to Congress a report on reservations made for interment at Arlington National Cemetery.
The report required by paragraph (1) shall include the following:

subparagraph.text: The number of requests for reservation of a gravesite at Arlington National Cemetery that were submitted to the Secretary of the Army before January 1, 1962.
The number of gravesites at such cemetery that, on the day before the date of the enactment of this Act, were reserved in response to such requests.
The number of such gravesites that, on the day before the date of the enactment of this Act, were unoccupied.

A list of all reservations for gravesites at such cemetery that were extended by individuals responsible for management of such cemetery in response to requests for such reservations made on or after January 1, 1962.
A description of the measures that the Secretary is taking to improve the accountability and transparency of the management of gravesite reservations at Arlington National Cemetery.
Such recommendations as the Secretary may have for legislative action as the Secretary considers necessary to improve such accountability and transparency.
